name: post_users_id_avatar
description: Adds or updates a user avatar.

pic.description:
The image file to be uploaded to Box.
Accepted file extensions are `.jpg` or `.png`.
The maximum file size is 1MB.

$block:
A resource holding URLs to the
avatar uploaded to a Box application.

$ul: **pic_urls**: Represents an object with user avatar URLs.
**large**: The location of a large-sized avatar.
**preview**: The location of the avatar preview.
**small**: The location of a small-sized avatar.
